properties.text:
MUSE MUSIC GENERATOR (EXPERIMENTAL)

Report issues: github.com/Greg-Aster/ComfyUI_Muse

KNOWN LIMITATIONS:
- Lyrics may not match sung words exactly
- Instrumental mode may still have vocal-like sounds
- Quality varies by style and seed
- Best for melody/style, not precise lyrics

REQUIREMENTS:
- First run downloads ~10GB of models
- Requires 12-16GB VRAM

STYLE is most important - be descriptive:
- "Pop, upbeat, female vocals, synth, 120 BPM"
- "Rock ballad, male vocals, electric guitar"
- "Lo-fi hip hop, chill, jazzy piano"

LYRICS: Use [Verse], [Chorus] markers.
For instrumental: enable toggle, leave lyrics empty.

groups.title: Muse Music Generator - Enter lyrics and style, then Queue Prompt
